paper_abstract: The paper presents ConSpec, an automata-based policy specification language. The language trades off clean semantics to language expressiveness: a formal semantics for the language is provided as security automata. ConSpec specifications can be used at different stages of the application lifecycle, rendering possible the formalization of various Policy enforcement techniques. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. paper_title: ConSpec - A formal language for policy specification
